ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The mountains move and fly away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the mountains shall violently fly about.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the mountains will move with a visible movement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains shall pass away passing away (altogether).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the mountains are in motion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the mountains move away with (awful) movement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the mountains shudder and shake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the mountains will move away with an awful movement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the mountains move with an awful motion:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the mountains will fly hither and thither.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mountains will move away with a (horrible) movement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the mountains go into motion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the mountains will pass on, departing -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:10] and the mountains move with a great motion, becoming scattered dust, this is the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the mountains move away) on the surface of the earth (with (awful) movement) like the movement of the clouds in the sky,
